channel.title: Spring Tool Suites 3 Updates
channel.description: This feeds imforms about important updates relevant to users of STS 3.

item.title: Thanks for installing STS 3.9.8
item.description:
Pivotal has released an update to Spring Tool Suite 3 (STS3), the best Eclipse-powered development environment for building Spring powered enterprise application.

Please review the following documents:

  • 3.9.8 New & Noteworthy

item.title: STS 3.9.8 has been released
item.description:
Pivotal has released an update to Spring Tool Suite 3 (STS3), the best Eclipse-powered development environment for building Spring powered enterprise application.

It is recommend to update as soon as possible.

Please review the following documents:

  • 3.9.8 New & Noteworthy
